## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G17470](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G17470)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCRSH, CRSH</u>
- **Gene Name:** Ca2+-activated RelA-spot homolog
- **Description:**   Ca2+-activated RelA/spot-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090487
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [crsh-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The dark-induced transient increment of ppGpp  after 10 min; the increment rapidly decreased to low levels after 30 min.
   - [crsh-null/crsh-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dark-induced transient increment of ppGpp  after 10 min; however, the  increment rapidly decreased to low levels after 30 min.
